channel.title: Endpoints on IGDB.com API Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Endpoints on IGDB.com API Documentation

item.title: Character
item.description: URL path: /characters/ Description: Video game characters Example response { "id": 1, "name": "Urdnot Wrex", "slug": "urdnot-wrex", "url": "https://www.igdb.com/characters/urdnot-wrex", "created_at": 123456789, "updated_at": 123456789 } Used fields Name Type Mandatory Comment id unsigned 64-bit integer + name string + slug string + url string + created_at 64-bit integer + Unix epoch updated_at 64-bit integer + Unix epoch mug_shot object - See the Image object reference gender integer - See the Gender value reference akas array of strings - Name aliases - ‘also known as’ species integer - See the Species value reference games array of unsigned 64-bit integers - IDs of Game records people array of unsigned 64-bit integers - IDs of Person records Unused fields

item.title: Collection
item.description: URL path: /collections/ Description: Collection, AKA Series Example response { "id": 1, "name": "Bioshock", "slug": "bioshock", "url": "https://www.igdb.com/collections/bioshock", "created_at": 123456789, "updated_at": 123456789, "games": [ 1, 2, 3, ... ] } Fields Name Type Mandatory Comment id unsigned 64-bit integer + name string + slug string + url string + created_at 64-bit integer + Unix epoch updated_at 64-bit integer + Unix epoch games array of unsigned 64-bit integers - IDs of Game records

item.title: Company
item.description: URL path: /companies/ Description: Video game companies. Both publishers & developers Example response { "id": 642, "name": "testcompany1", "slug": "testcompany1", "url": "https://www.igdb.com/companies/testcompany1", "created_at": 123456789, "updated_at": 123456789, ... } Fields Name Type Mandatory Comment id unsigned 64-bit integer + name string + slug string + url string + created_at 64-bit integer + Unix epoch updated_at 64-bit integer + Unix epoch logo object - See the Image object reference description string - country integer - Please see the ISO-3316-1 reference website string - start_date 64-bit integer - Unix epoch start_date_category integer - See the Date category value reference changed_company_id unsigned 64-bit integer - ID of a Company record change_date 64-bit integer - Unix epoch change_date_category integer - See the Date category value reference twitter string - The URL of the Twitter profile published array of unsigned 64-bit integers - IDs of Game records developed array of unsigned 64-bit integers - IDs of Game records Unused fields

item.title: Credits
item.description: URL path: /credits/ Description: Contains all employees responsible for working on the game. Example response { "id": 268458528, "created_at": 1448841876902, "updated_at": 1448841876902, "category": 1, "game": 6913, "position": 122, "person": 96942, "character": 441 } Fields Name Type Mandatory Comment id unsigned 64-bit integer + name string + slug string + url string + created_at 64-bit integer + Unix epoch updated_at 64-bit integer + Unix epoch game unsigned 64-bit integer - ID of a Game record (expandable) category integer - See the Credit category value reference company unsigned 64-bit integer - ID of a Company record (expandable) position unsigned 64-bit integer - Position in the credits list.

item.title: External Review
item.description: This endpoint is only available for pro and ultra tiers. URL path: /external_reviews/ Example response { "id": 50331, "game": 7621, "source": 30, "score": 40, "url": "http://www.impulsegamer.com/rime-switch-review/" } Fields Name Type Mandatory Comment id unsigned 64-bit integer + game unsigned 64-bit integer + ID of a Game record source unsigned 64-bit integer + ID of an External Review Source url string + score integer The review score out of 100

item.title: External Review Source
item.description: URL path: /external_review_source/ Example response { "id": 50331, "game": 7621, "source": 30, "score": 40, "url": "http://www.impulsegamer.com/rime-switch-review/" } Fields Name Type Mandatory Comment id unsigned 64-bit integer + game unsigned 64-bit integer + ID of a Game record source unsigned 64-bit integer + ID of an External Review Source url string + score integer The review score out of 100

item.title: Feed
item.description: URL path: /feeds/ Description: Feed items are a social feed of status updates, media and news articles. Example response { "id": 1234, "created_at": 1489255204000, "updated_at": 1490353040531, "url": "https://www.igdb.com/feed/ya", "content": "Testing the new feed items.", "category": 7 } Fields Name Type Mandatory Comment id unsigned 64-bit integer + url string + created_at 64-bit integer + Unix epoch updated_at 64-bit integer + Unix epoch content text (long string) - category unsigned 64-bit integer - ID of a Feed Item Category user unsigned 64-bit integer - ID of a User record games array of unsigned 64-bit integer - ID of a Game record title string - feed_likes_count 64-bit integer -

item.title: Franchise
item.description: URL path: /franchises/ Description: A list of video game franchises such as Star Wars. Example response { "id": 1, "name": "Star Wars", "slug": "star-wars", "url": "https://www.igdb.com/franchises/star-wars", "created_at": 123456789, "updated_at": 123456789, "games": [ 1, 2, 3, ... ] } Fields Name Type Mandatory Comment id unsigned 64-bit integer + name string + slug string + url string + created_at 64-bit integer + Unix epoch updated_at 64-bit integer + Unix epoch games array of unsigned 64-bit integers - IDs of Game records

item.title: Game
item.description: URL path: /games/ Description: Video Games! Example response { "id": 1234, "name": "Test game", "slug": "/games/test-game", "url": "https://www.igdb.com/games/test-game", "created_at": 123456789, "updated_at": 123456789 } Fields Name Type Mandatory Comment id unsigned 64-bit integer + name string + slug string + url string + created_at 64-bit integer + Unix epoch updated_at 64-bit integer + Unix epoch summary text (long string) - storyline text (long string) - collection unsigned 64-bit integer - ID of a Collection record franchise unsigned 64-bit integer - ID of a Franchise record hypes integer - Number of follows a game gets before release popularity double - A number based on traffic to that game page rating double - Average user rating rating_count integer - Number of user ratings aggregated_rating double - Rating based on external critic scores aggregated_rating_count integer - Number of external critic scores total_rating double - Average rating based on both IGDB user and external critic scores total_rating_count integer - Total number of user and external critic scores game unsigned 64-bit integer - ID of a Game this game is a DLC/expansion of (expandable) version_parent unsigned 64-bit integer - ID of a Game this game is an edition of developers array of unsigned 64-bit integers - IDs of Company records (expandable) publishers array of unsigned 64-bit integers - IDs of Company records (expandable) game_engines array of unsigned 64-bit integers - IDs of Game engine records category integer - See the Game category value reference time_to_beat object - See the Time to beat object reference player_perspectives array of unsigned 64-bit integers - IDs of Player perspective records game_modes array of unsigned 64-bit integers - IDs of Game mode records keywords array of unsigned 64-bit integers - IDs of Keyword records themes array of unsigned 64-bit integers - IDs of Theme records genres array of unsigned 64-bit integers - IDs of Genre records platforms array of unsigned 64-bit integers - IDs of Platform records first_release_date 64-bit integer - Unix epoch status integer - See the Game status value reference release_dates array of objects - See the Release date object reference alternative_names array of objects - See the Alternative name object reference screenshots array of objects - See the Image object reference videos array of objects - See the Video object reference cover object - See the Image object reference esrb object - See the ESRB object reference pegi object - See the PEGI object reference websites array of objects - See the Website object reference tags array of unsigned 32-bit integers - An array of Tag Numbers dlcs array of unsigned 64-bit integers - IDs of Game records (expandable) expansions array of unsigned 64-bit integers - IDs of Game records (expandable) standalone_expansions array of unsigned 64-bit integers - IDs of Game records (expandable) bundles array of unsigned 64-bit integers - IDs of Game records (expandable) games array of unsigned 64-bit integers - IDs of Game records that are similar to this game.

item.title: Game engine
item.description: URL path: /game_engines/ Description: Video game engines such as unreal engine. Example response { "id": 2, "name": "Frostbite", "slug": "frostbite", "url": "https://www.igdb.com/game_engines/frostbite", "created_at": 123456789, "updated_at": 123456789 } Fields Name Type Mandatory Comment id unsigned 64-bit integer + name string + slug string + url string + created_at 64-bit integer + Unix epoch updated_at 64-bit integer + Unix epoch logo object - See the Image object reference games array of unsigned 64-bit integers - IDs of Game records companies array of unsigned 64-bit integers - IDs of Company records platforms array of unsigned 64-bit integers - IDs of Platforms records

item.title: Game mode
item.description: URL path: /game_modes/ Description: Single player, Multiplayer etc Example response { "id": 1, "name": "Single player", "slug": "single-player", "url": "https://www.igdb.com/game_modes/single-player", "created_at": 123456789, "updated_at": 123456789 } Fields Name Type Mandatory Comment id unsigned 64-bit integer + name string + slug string + url string + created_at 64-bit integer + Unix epoch updated_at 64-bit integer + Unix epoch games array of unsigned 64-bit integers - IDs of Game records

item.title: Genre
item.description: URL path: /genres/ Example response { "id": 2, "name": "Point-and-click", "slug": "point-and-click", "url": "https://www.igdb.com/genres/point-and-click", "created_at": 123456789, "updated_at": 123456789, "games": [ 1, 2, 3, ... ] } Fields Name Type Mandatory Comment id unsigned 64-bit integer + name string + slug string + url string + created_at 64-bit integer + Unix epoch updated_at 64-bit integer + Unix epoch games array of unsigned 64-bit integers - IDs of Game records

item.title: Keyword
item.description: URL path: /keywords/ Description: Keywords are words or phrases that get tagged to a game such as “world war 2” or “steampunk”. Example response { "id": 1, "name": "modern warfare", "slug": "modern-warfare", "url": "https://www.igdb.com/categories/modern-warfare", "created_at": 123456789, "updated_at": 123456789, "games": [ 1, 2, 3, ... ] } Fields Name Type Mandatory Comment id unsigned 64-bit integer + name string + slug string + url string + created_at 64-bit integer + Unix epoch updated_at 64-bit integer + Unix epoch games array of unsigned 64-bit integers - IDs of Game records

item.title: Page
item.description: URL path: /pages/ Description: Our multipurpose page system is currently used for youtubers and media organisations. Example response { "id": 1234, "name": "The Super channel.", "created_at": 1488287162348, "updated_at": 1488287515627, "slug": "the-super-channel", "url": "https://www.igdb.com/p/the-super-channel", "page_follows_count": 0, "description": "Playing awesome games quick!", "youtube": "https://www.youtube.com/channel/abc123", "logo": { "url": "//images.igdb.com/igdb/image/upload/t_thumb/abc123.png", "cloudinary_id": "abc123", "width": 240, "height": 240 }, "background": { "url": "//images.igdb.com/igdb/image/upload/t_thumb/abc123.png", "cloudinary_id": "abc123", "width": 1920, "height": 1080 } } Fields Name Type Mandatory Comment id unsigned 64-bit integer + slug string + url string + created_at 64-bit integer + Unix epoch updated_at 64-bit integer + Unix epoch name string + content text (long string) - category unsigned 64-bit integer - sub_category unsigned 64-bit integer - country integer - Please see the ISO-3316-1 reference color unsigned 64-bit integer - user 64-bit integers - game 64-bit integers - IDs of Game records company 64-bit integers - IDs of Company records description text (long string) - page_follows_count 64-bit integer - logo objects - See the Image object reference background objects - See the Image object reference facebook string - twitter string - twitch string - instagram string - youtube string - steam string - linkedin string - pinterest string - soundcloud string - google_plus string - reddit string - battlenet string - origin string - uplay string - discord string -

item.title: Person
item.description: URL path: /people/ Description: Individuals who are in the video games industry Example response { "id": 557, "name": "Adam Longton", "slug": "adam-longton", "url": "https://www.igdb.com/people/adam-longton", "created_at": 123456789, "updated_at": 123456789, "games": [ 1, 2, 3, ... ] } Fields Name Type Mandatory Comment id unsigned 64-bit integer + name string + slug string + url string + created_at 64-bit integer + Unix epoch updated_at 64-bit integer + Unix epoch mug_shot object - See the Image object reference games array of unsigned 64-bit integers - IDs of Game records characters array of unsigned 64-bit integers - IDs of Character records voice_acted array of unsigned 64-bit integers - IDs of Game records Unused fields

item.title: Platform
item.description: URL path: /platforms/ Description: The hardware used to run the game or game delivery network Example response { "id": 2, "name": "Wii", "slug": "wii", "url": "https://www.igdb.com/platform/wii", "created_at": 123456789, "updated_at": 123456789, "games": [ 1, 2, 3, ... ] } Fields Name Type Mandatory Comment id unsigned 64-bit integer + name string + slug string + url string + created_at 64-bit integer + Unix epoch updated_at 64-bit integer + Unix epoch logo object - See the Image object reference website string - summary text (long string) - alternative_name string - generation integer - games array of unsigned 64-bit integers - IDs of Game records versions array of objects - See the Platform version object reference Unused fields

item.title: Play Times
item.description: Getting detailed play times for a client id What is a client id? A Client ID is a unique identifier defined by you or your code. The idea is to generate a client ID that can be recalled for a certain user. For example, it could be a salted and hashed version of the mac ID or an external user ID. This ID can be used to save and recall play time data.

item.title: Player Perspective
item.description: URL path: /player_perspectives/ Example response { "id": 1, "name": "First person", "slug": "first-person", "url": "https://www.igdb.com/player_perspectives/first-person", "created_at": 123456789, "updated_at": 123456789, "games": [ 1, 2, 3, ... ] } Fields Name Type Mandatory Comment id unsigned 64-bit integer + name string + slug string + url string + created_at 64-bit integer + Unix epoch updated_at 64-bit integer + Unix epoch games array of unsigned 64-bit integers - IDs of Game records

item.title: Pulse
item.description: URL path: /pulses/ Description: A single news article. Example response { "id": 1, "pulse_source": 1, "title": "End of 2015 Discussions Megathread", "summary": "<!-- SC_OFF --><div class=\"md\"><h3>December 31</h3> ...", "url": "https://www.pcgamer.com/super-cool-article", "uid": "g87d799g520fhu2hk45jhk", "author": "Forestl", "published_at": 1448892803000 } Fields Name Type Mandatory Comment id unsigned 64-bit integer + pulse_source integer + ID of a Pulse Source title string + summary text (long string) + Can contain HTML markup url string + Publisher’s pulse URL, can be path only.

item.title: Pulse Group
item.description: URL path: /pulse_groups/ Example response { "id": 33, "name": "Dissidia Final Fantasy NT", "created_at": 1496847873582, "updated_at": 1496849184912, "published_at": 1496848080000, "tags": [ 805343199, 1073741826 ], "pulses": [ 141662, 141667, 141668 ], "game": 36831 } Fields Name Type Mandatory Comment id unsigned 64-bit integer + name string + category 64-bit integer + Unused (for now) created_at 64-bit integer + Unix epoch updated_at 64-bit integer + Unix epoch published_at 64-bit integer + Unix epoch tags array of unsigned 32-bit integers - An array of Tag Numbers pulses array of unsigned 64-bit integers - ID of a Pulse item game array of unsigned 64-bit integers - ID of a Game

item.title: Pulse Source
item.description: URL path: /pulse_sources/ Description: A news article source such as IGN. Example response { "id": 1, "name": "Kotaku", "game": 4536, "page": 345 } Fields Name Type Mandatory Comment id unsigned 64-bit integer + name string + Name of pulse source game unsigned 64-bit integer + ID of a Game record if this pulse source has a game connected to it page unsigned 64-bit integer + ID of a Page record if this pulse source has a page connected to it

item.title: Release date
item.description: URL path: /release_dates/ Description: A handy endpoint that extends the games endpoint. Used to dig deeper into release dates, platforms and versions. Example response { "id": 4034, "game": 1936, "category": 7, "platform": 48, "human": "TBD" } Fields Name Type Mandatory Comment id unsigned 64-bit integer + game unsigned 64-bit integer + ID of a Game record category unsigned integer + See the Date category value reference platform unsigned 64-bit integer + ID of a Platform record human string + The release date in human readable format.

item.title: Review
item.description: URL path: /reviews/ Example response { "id": 7, "username": "thespikez", "slug": "trash-of-the-year", "url": "https://www.igdb.com/games/into-the-dark/reviews/trash-of-the-year", "title": "Trash of the year.", "created_at": 123456789, "updated_at": 123456789, "game": 6613, "category": 1, "likes": 0, "views": 138, "rating_category": 2, "platform": 6, "introduction": "Don't expect a good game here", "content": "Don't even ..." } Fields Name Type Mandatory Comment id unsigned 64-bit integer + username string + slug string + url string + title string + created_at 64-bit integer + Unix epoch updated_at 64-bit integer + Unix epoch game unsigned 64-bit integer + ID of a Game record category integer + ?

item.title: Theme
item.description: URL path: /themes/ Example response { "id": 1, "name": "Action", "slug": "action", "url": "https://www.igdb.com/themes/action", "created_at": 123456789, "updated_at": 123456789, "games": [ 1, 2, 3, ... ] } Fields Name Type Mandatory Comment id unsigned 64-bit integer + name string + slug string + url string + created_at 64-bit integer + Unix epoch updated_at 64-bit integer + Unix epoch games array of unsigned 64-bit integers - IDs of Game records

item.title: Title
item.description: URL path: /titles/ Description: Job titles in the industry. Example response { "id": 12003, "name": "Brand Presentation Director", "created_at": 1424455593564, "updated_at": 1424455593588, "slug": "brand-presentation-director", "url": "https://www.igdb.com/titles/brand-presentation-director", "games": [ 6801 ] } Fields Name Type Mandatory Comment id unsigned 64-bit integer + name string + slug string + url string + created_at 64-bit integer + Unix epoch updated_at 64-bit integer + Unix epoch description string - games array of unsigned 64-bit integers - IDs of Game records (expandable)

item.title: User Profile
item.description: URL path: /me/ Description: IGDB user profile Important: You can only access this information with a valid access token. And the profile is connected to the accesstoken. Example response { "id": 7331, "username": "1337", "slug": "1337", "url": "https://www.igdb.com/users/1337", "created_at": 1484834834279, "updated_at": 1510306478341, "role": 9, "color": 5, "avatar": { "url": "//images.igdb.com/igdb/image/upload/t_thumb/yvk53qfbt3vwjz2iwevw.jpg", "cloudinary_id": "yvk53qfbt3vwjz2iwevw", "width": 600, "height": 600 }, "background": { "url": "//images.igdb.com/igdb/image/upload/t_thumb/gstfbf0007llxsj9t8mn.jpg", "cloudinary_id": "gstfbf0007llxsj9t8mn", "width": 8000, "height": 4500 } } Fields

item.title: Versions
item.description: URL path: /game_versions/ Description: Details about game editions and versions. Example response [ { "id": 1, "game": 28540, "created_at": 1505219853364, "updated_at": 1507493062339, "games": [ 28540, 39045, 39044, 39047, 39034, 39046 ], "url": "https://www.igdb.com/games/assassins-creed-origins/", "features": [ { "title": "Notes", "description": "", "category": 1, "position": 3, "values": [ { "game": 39034, "value": "" }, { "game": 39046, "value": "Ubisoft Store exclusive." }, { "game": 39045, "value": "" }, { "game": 39044, "value": "" }, { "game": 39047, "value": "Only 999 copies available.
